      • save

        @RequestMapping(value="/countries",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity save​(@RequestBody @Valid
                                                    @Valid CountryRequest countryRequest)
        This service allow save new countries
        Parameters:
        countryRequest - the request with country data
        Returns:
        response with status code (ok) and country data

      • listCountries

        @RequestMapping("/countries")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity listCountries()
        This service allow get all countries in database
        Returns:
        response with status code (ok) and the list of countries

      • getById

        @RequestMapping("/countries/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getById​(@PathVariable
                                                       java.lang.Long id)
        This service allow search a country using its id
        Parameters:
        id - of the country that you want to find
        Returns:
        response with status (ok or not found) and, if id exists, country data

      • editById

        @RequestMapping(value="/countries/{id}",
                method=PUT)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity editById​(@PathVariable
                                                        java.lang.Long id,
                                                        @RequestBody @Valid
                                                        @Valid CountryRequest countryRequest)
        This service allow edit country data
        Parameters:
        id - of the country that you want to update
        id - of the country that you want to update and countryRequest with new country data
        Returns:
        response with status code (ok, not found or bad request) and, if ok, country data updated

      • removeById

        @RequestMapping(value="/countries/{id}",
                method=DELETE)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity removeById​(@PathVariable
                                                          java.lang.Long id)
        This service allow remove a country
        Parameters:
        id - of the country that you want to delete
        Returns:
        response with the status code (ok or not found)
